statusLine.command: input=$(cat); user=$(whoami); dir=$(basename "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')"); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); git_status=""; if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null)" ]; then git_status=" ✗"; fi; git_info=" ⎇ $branch$git_status"; else git_info=""; fi; printf "\033[1;34m%s\033[0m \033[1;32m%s\033[0m%s \033[1;36m%s\033[0m" "$user" "$dir" "$git_info" "$model"
